SELECT i.id, i.item_name, i.sell_counts, ii.url, tempSpec.price_discount as priceDiscount FROM items i LEFT JOIN item_images ii on i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) as price_discount from item_specs GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

SELECT i.id, i.item_name, i.sell_counts, ii.url, tempSpec.price_discount as priceDiscount FROM items i LEFT JOIN item_images ii on i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) as price_discount from item_specs GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1 and i.cat_id = #{catId} order by
i.sell_counts desc
